## Geocoding addresses

In this tutorial: How to geocode, i.e. add latitude and longitude to a CSV/tabular dataset that only contains addresses, which will allow you to plot the CSV on a map.

This tutorial uses [Geocodio](https://geocod.io)

## Data downloads

[COVID meals dataset without latitude and longitude](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SJbcNBIBlKuaPQJpg84D0APOFMLNIXNR/view) to practice

[Original COVID meals dataset](https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Education/COVID-19-Free-Meals-Locations/sp4a-vevi/about_data)
